website_summaries.verdict: The Yamaha YAS-203 breaks free of most of the performance constraints of budget sound bars, sounding bigger, more spacious, more dynamic and clearer than anything near its price.
pros: The Yamaha YAS-203 sounds great for the price, with excellent soundstage depth for surround movies and very good music playback
It offers a host of useful features including Bluetooth and DTS decoding, dedicated source indicators on the front panel and a great remote control
The sound bar comes with a rear-mounted IR blaster just in case the speaker blocks the IR port on your TV
cons: it has slightly harsh Bluetooth sound with non-aptX devices

customer_reviews.title: Is not worth the high price
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed considering the price $450 paid......sound quality is average and the woofer seems woefully underpowered......set up was ok, but the sound bar does not pack any punches.....only reason I am not returning is because of the seller policies of hitting you with stocking fees and shipping....next time, I will check the fine print and order from Amazon sold or fulfilled....feel like I got a Kia after paying for a Benz
customer_reviews.author: NJGuy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound Bar!
customer_reviews.text: WOW...what a good looking and great sounding sound bar for this price! At 35" it just fits into our entertainment center's 36" shelf. It came with one of the most comprehensive and easy to understand owner's manual I've seen in a long time. I set it up in about 2 hours including programing my TV remote, setting up the woofer Bluetooth and setting up the Bluetooth with my Android phone. Everything worked on the first try as I read & followed all of the instructions carefully. The woofer 'woofs' just right and the sound from the sound bar is incredible! Good job Yamaha for a great product! I've had several sound bars before but, this one is a keeper..
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my HIGH expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE this speaker that I got yesterday! I almost bought it when it was $400 just two weeks ago so when I saw it on sale for $300 I jumped immediately! Last night I cranked up the subwoofer volume and the soundbar volume all the way and my wood floor was shaking! Movies and music just got a whole lot better! This sounds better than the last surround sound system I had which came with six different pieces! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara777

customer_reviews.title: I can hear you now.
customer_reviews.text: Great clear sound for both music and dialogue. Better than our older Bose sound system. (It would be even better with a radio.) My hearing isn't like it used to be and I often need to turn on subtitles when voices aren't distinct. I don't need to do that with the Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Kalegra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic soundbar.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic soundbar for the price. Bought this because i got tired of all the spaghetti of wires on my 2.1 system. Having the sub-woofer wireless was a stroke of genius. I use mine on my pc through the SPDIF, so i realize many people will buy this for a TV. Sound quality is amazing and if you pair it with a receiver volume should not be an issue. Plenty of power to rattle your windows if you need it to. On the more realistic side, it provides crisp clear believable surround sounds and both the soundbar and sub-woofers levels can be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: LanFear

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my outdoor bar and pool deck in a covered space. I am very impressed with the expansive sound and ability to fill the space with TV and music. You would have to be a true sound enthusiast to find fault with this product. I am a novice, but I have a very high end home theater room to compare it to. It's not in the same league but I appreciate good sound and am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Weedo

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound for what it is.  Easy no-brainer setup.
customer_reviews.text: I got this refurb soundbar for a great low price and it works fine for its intended purposes... better than the living room TV speaker and not nearly as good as music speakers, which is fine with me, as I have a high-end audiophile 2-channel system in my study and use the living room mainly for TV watching and occasional music streaming via Airport Express or built-in Bluetooth. Pros: Easy no-brainer setup (even a caveman can do it), inputs for optical, coaxial, bluetooth, RCA analog. Cons: stereo and surround modes not much different...I actually prefer the stereo mode for crisper dialogues and music listening.
customer_reviews.author: GoBearsTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: One remote, finally...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the same time as my new 60" flat screen because I was afraid the TV speakers wouldn't cut it. As a replacement for underpowered stock TV speakers, this unit is superb. Large sound, and the subwoofer adds significant base when needed. My primary concern was operating all devices with one remote, and after spending about 5 minutes to "learn" the TV remote, it does exactly that. Not a replacement for surround sound theater speakers, but couldn't be happier with it in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Hedgemoe

customer_reviews.title: Some things are funny to me though
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound quality without breaking the bank. Some things are funny to me though. How companies add on features and make it seem as if the product is more than what it is. Example: The clear voice /sound option. As if I turn it on and have to think "do I want a muffled voice or a clear voice to be heard? of course that shouldn't be an option it should just be the official sound of the system. I can see the bass extension being an option and overall I like this sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from the rave reviews on Amazon.com. The sound is decent but not wow. I have it placed in the bedroom so I don't need the sound bar to be that loud. I like the easy setup and the remote pass through options to simplify all the remotes you need to operate a simple TV and sound bar. The programming was relatively easy and painless. Very surprised Yamaha made sound bars.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: *updated to 4-stars* Other than the optical cable, this system is perfect for the price point. The optical cable that it came with died within 24 hours, so plan on buying one anyway. The wireless sub is great and really does connect seamlessly. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: CSS

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.  Very pleased with this sound bar!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60 inch Samsung 7000 series and wanted to replace my old Sony sound bar from 2007. Spent a couple months researching between the Samsung 550 sound bar and this Yamaha YAS-203. They're both around $400. Ultimately decided with the Yamaha...MAN AM I PLEASED!!!! The sound quality is amazing (for a sound bar) and the Bluetooth function on my iPhone works perfectly. Subwoofer/speaker outperforms the Samsung but a mile. Not sure why people don't like the phone app; I find it quite simple to use and convenient. All sound bars are easy to set up but this one is THE SIMPLEST to install. I don't think there's another sound bar that performs as well at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Shen

customer_reviews.title: Bought this item Used after read a lot of great reviews. But 4 months later mine kept of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item Used after read a lot of great reviews. But 4 months later mine kept of turning itself off after about 30 minutes. Very annoying when watching movie. Have to turn it back on again every time it turn off. Will look for something more reliable and will stay away from used items from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D N.

customer_reviews.title: This gives great sound and the clear voice function works great
customer_reviews.text: we had just bought a new TV for our new apartment and was looking for a sound system. I've always had surround sound but wanted something smaller with less wires. This gives great sound and the clear voice function works great. when on the voices come out slightly louder then regular sounds which really helps to hear dialogue. I would not hesitate to recommend this product or even buy a second one if i needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Wow what sound
customer_reviews.text: Totally Love this Sound bar. Blows the TV speakers out of the water. What great sound.... Can hear every word they say, without have the volume up 60 or 65 on TV speakers. Great system. Thank you, Yamaha.....
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this sound system. For the price this system really delivers. It was easy to setup. Subwoofer connects automatically via bluetooth. It integrated very well with my AV devices and I am able to use my one remote for my television to adjust the volume and power. The app works fairly well but not a lot of options on it. It doesn't replace a 5.1 sound system but it does a reasonable facsimile. For my ears it sounds fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jorud

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good for tv and for music
customer_reviews.text: We are liking this speaker bar so far, and are having no major issues with it. Occaisionally we have to manual un-pair one device before pairing another with the bluetooth, but that seems to be more of an issue with the device than the speaker. The sound is good for tv and for music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great 1 day in
customer_reviews.text: The original version was broken, but Amazon managed to pick-up the first one and drop off a replacement the next day. So far, the sound quality is amazing and the bar looks great under our HDTV. Yamaha tech support was also fast and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Turnbaugh

customer_reviews.title: A decent soundbar for its price
customer_reviews.text: I believe this soundbar produces the sound quality true to its SOURCE. If you are looking for that WOW effect, such as in some vizio soundbars that enhances the bass, then this is not for you. This strikes a balance between fidelity and versatility. You can use this to reproduce movie audio streams with great quality, as well as operate it at night, with very little bass, and also, stream music with great sound.
customer_reviews.author: onyx

customer_reviews.title: is a nice addition. The sound is crisp and clean
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar and subwoofer were protected very well during shipping. I unpacked the product, set it up per the instructions, and everything worked flawlessly. The bluetooth feature with the free software for Iphone, iPAD, etc...is a nice addition. The sound is crisp and clean, whether music or movies this is the product to have...packed full of features and quality for the price, it cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Smackafatty

customer_reviews.title: great sound and form-factor compromise
customer_reviews.text: great quality sound, but it's only 22watt per channel, so don't expect getting much more sound than TV builtin speakers... just much better quality. A bit pricey I now think, although commercial reviews say it's best quality of anything under $1000... I still think it's great for the form factor in some locations (bedroom, etc), but a component 2.1 system for the same price would sound even better.
customer_reviews.author: dsk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just great sound for the price. My friend has a sounder/subwoofer that he paid 5K and he says this sounds as good. It's in a big room and pumps out plenty of sound with no distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: This Yamaha soundbar fits great beneath my entertainment center and the profile is perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This Yamaha soundbar fits great beneath my entertainment center and the profile is perfect with my new sleek Vizio 57" Mseries HDTV. It produces great sound, and I like the many options it has For surround sound, stereo, etc. It was really easy to set up and pair via Bluetooth different devices. I will say make sure you know how to install the optical cables, because that was not something I had experience with before. Overall great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: DanielleR

customer_reviews.title: Better sound playing music through Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Better sound playing music through Bluetooth. As surround sound for movie it is satisfactory, does make voices and sound louder. Overall it is one of better sound bars out there.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Groff

customer_reviews.title: Good Looks and Performance
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar has made life less complicated. Connecting this system to your television couldn't be much easier. Just a single optical cable, which is supplied with the unit, does the job. The subwoofer is wireless so you can put it where convenient. I like the quality of sound which is a big improvement over the small speakers built into the TV. Since this evice has Bluetooth, I can use my iPad to play music without the need for any wires. Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R. Kluge

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. Will not replace a regular 5-1 system but it does sound better than the TV speakers. It has a very nice case although it is plastic. Remote is fine. Still having problems training this remote to use for my cable box and power on/off for tv. I will keep trying. If anyone has any tips please pass them on.
customer_reviews.author: robert mullins

customer_reviews.title: Great sound sub is a little weak.
customer_reviews.text: I've had to up the sub to get it where I want so I wouldn't really count that against it. Sound quality is great, over Bluetooth or optical. This thing really cranks too. I use it in a bedroom but this would easily be able to satisfy a small to medium family room.
customer_reviews.author: GeneralConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Putting away my full system because of my baby is crawling. My large towers seem to be an accident waiting to happen. Bought this because of good review on CNET. May be I'm spoiled by better speakers. The sound is flat. The woofers offers no punch. Once the kids are older, these go in the storage.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a few minor complaints
customer_reviews.text: I tried the sharp sb602 before i got this. Many reviews i read stated that the yamaha sounded better. I agree, the treble is a lot smoother on the yamaha. Its almost ear piercing on the sharp, however, the sharp was much louder in general. The bass was also much more powerful on the sharp. I wish this system was louder, but it produces a more pleasant sound experience. Good job Yamaha
customer_reviews.author: L C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy! Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup, excellent sound on movies, music, games and sports. Haven't found one thing yet I don't like. The lack of HDMI is annoying but not detrimental.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great enhancement to my living room!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my living room set/up. Flat screen monitie's audio was awful. The Yamaha sound bar makes the audio sound great! We have the subwoofer located behind the sofa and is a nice add to those low tones. Subwoofer levels can be adhjusted. Love the Bluetooth connection to my iPhone so I can control levels from there. It was everything I needed to make the living room into a media room!
customer_reviews.author: Scootrr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price and very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: anthony williams

customer_reviews.title: great for the price , but it is a mid level system ....
customer_reviews.text: Does have a great sound for music and movies , especially at higher volumes , but the clarity on the dialogue is only mediocre. Even with the vocal enhance setting. It's a great lower end unit , but in retrospect I probably should have spent a little more on a higher end system to be fully satisfied. Over all though it good enough for normal use .
customer_reviews.author: Frugalshopper

customer_reviews.title: It works very nicely with our HDTV via an optical cable (remember to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works very nicely with our HDTV via an optical cable (remember to turn off the TV's internal speakers). The "Clear voice" mode really helps my hearing voice dialog. The woofer, whose volume is separately controlled, produces great base notes/explosion sounds, etc. I highly recommend this sound bar system!
customer_reviews.author: W. Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but really need to be sitting directly in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but really need to be sitting directly in front of it to get full affect - quickly loses lust if you are sitting off to side. Bluetooth is VERY easy to setup. Sub is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this sound bar. Plays Music and movies with great detail.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar has really nice performance for both movies and music. Great for small to medium sized rooms. But keep in mind it is just a sound bar so High volume is limited yet impressive all the same.
customer_reviews.author: spawny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound.  Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this. Hooked to Lenovo ThinkPad P70 through Creative X-fi external sound card. Just fits under the monitor on my desktop. Excelent sound and very nice for conference calls on Gotomeeting, Webex or skype.
customer_reviews.author: Steve morin

customer_reviews.title: Works well for movies. It really helps with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for movies. It really helps with the sound including the voice of actors. Doesn't get loud for music. Just not enough umph
customer_reviews.author: B. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: just got it today installed sounds awesome playing music from my phone with the Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: just got it today installed sounds awesome playing music from my phone with the Bluetooth. sounds good with movies too not great in the surround sound department but definitely an improvement over tv speakers. i would recommend the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Rich, full sound in smaller room
customer_reviews.text: Without going into too much detail, have fallen in love with this product in our small living room. Was looking for rich, full sound while watching TV, and some deeper bass when listening to music and this sound bar / sub combo delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Woj

customer_reviews.title: awesome sound. Yamaha is one of the main leaders ...
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality, awesome sound. Yamaha is one of the main leaders in sound components and have been for quite some time. Totally satisfied. Just make sure if your TV needs a 3 prong RCA cord. you must choose the right cable hook up according to your TV or other devices. Highly recommended. Thank You. Kimberly&Jerry
customer_reviews.author: KP Pal

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good sound quality from such a compact system
customer_reviews.text: Fills the room with sound. The sub is quite effective, and the "clear voice" setting is so nice for removing the mud from badly-mixed dialogue tracks. The wireless subwoofer vastly simplifies setups within entertainment center/wall units. Get this. You will be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Stuart Leeds

customer_reviews.title: Why no headphone out??? Weird.
customer_reviews.text: One wish, an audio (headphone) out, otherwise great value. Bass is limited at lower volumes than my previous wired model, but at higher volumes, it kicks in nicely. Controls are intuitive, but you can tell the Yamaha "app" was an afterthought. BlueTooth connectivity is seamless and reliable. My Logitech Harmony One also worked seamlessly with this model. Why no headphone out??? Weird.
customer_reviews.author: USERBOSCO

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: Performs just like the many review I read said. Not as great as surround, but well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BRZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for small rooms
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good in a smaller room such as the bedroom, it just lacks the umph for the vaulted ceiling living room.
customer_reviews.author: Loudog33

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! Very simple to set up and sounds great. Music from bluetooth devices sounds awesome!! I downloaded the home theater app and can control the unit from my iPhone now. Tested it out with some live concert DVDs and the quality of the sound is amazing. Handles surround or stereo. Set the DVD player's digital output to Bitstream ... Yamaha handles the decoding without missing a beat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: this sound bar in my opinion is also the best because the sound bar I bought before it was ...
customer_reviews.text: this sound bar in my opinion is also the best because the sound bar I bought before it was great ,but I missing my surround sound witch this has. I love it. and I won't part with it. so in conclusion anyone interested in buying this furture won't be sorry./ oh p.s. I don't care about HDMI MY TV DOES'NT IT.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Drinkwine

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome performance for my 65” LG HDTV in our basement. Great sound, easy install and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Clarity is great. Surround effects even with Subwoofer in Back of ...
customer_reviews.text: Clarity is great. Surround effects even with Subwoofer in Back of room are highly limited. Still... it sounds much better and louder than built-in TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar and Sub
customer_reviews.text: sounds great! i wish it was just a little louder when i needed it. To make it loud for impact it is almost all the way up. I would want it to be able to go way louder if needed. Otherwise Sub is great! the bluetooth is decent. Connecting sometimes is a hit and miss thing. Great soundbar though!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds fantastic for the price! And I'm near-audiophile picky on speakers. For small / medium room where full 5.1 surround is not desired, this is a great choice and value.
customer_reviews.author: Claudius C

customer_reviews.title: A sound bar that works and sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, looks good, easy installation. I like the ability to hook up my tv remote to run this sound bar. Only 1 remote required instead of juggling a remote to change the channel, another for sound, another to find the right input, etc. BIG sound in a small package. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Our sound is AMAZING now! No more turning up and down the volume the whole movie! Wish we would have bought this years ago, we can finally hear the people talking on a movie!
customer_reviews.author: jpville

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. The speakers sound perfectly clear and have great surround sound. The subwoofer really makes a difference in the quality of surround sound. The bluetooth feature is really handy because you can play your music on your phone through the speakers as well. The Controller App allows you to change the type of sound based on what you're watching and the different sound levels, if you want. The sound bar is also sleek-looking and isn't clunky at all. We decided to hang the sound bar under our TV and we love the way it looks. Overall, a really great product and no regrets in regards to the value of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Odom

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as the sound on our new Samsung LED Smart TV is nothing short of "TERRIBLE"!!! This soundbar is certainly a massive improvement. The sound is very clear and crisp and the sub hefty enough to provide good depth and bass. It is no substitute for a true 5.1 setup with amp but if you want to substantially improve your sound from your flat-panel TV and want to do it on a budget ($299) I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Hillock

customer_reviews.title: Garbage sound bar, avoid Yamaha at all costs
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about two years, my great audio but it did the job. Then suddenly it just stopped working. Won't turn on at all. Yamaha no help at all, troubleshooting tips were worthless. Please avoid any Yamaha products
customer_reviews.author: Est Est

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this soundbar. Did a lot of research and was willing to spend much more than this product cost but everything kept pointing me to the YAS-203. Sounds great with nice simulated surround sound. The bass hits nice and deep.
customer_reviews.author: Mamas_daily_essentials

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound. Good bass. Even sounds good playing music from iPhone or music channels on TV. APP allows you to control the sound bar from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy set up. Purchased for my condo and I put it right under my 65" TV. The sound is amazing for such a small soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Sounds like coming from a tin can
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Sounds like coming from a tin can. Cannot get good sound from it. Very disappointed. Not sure what the other reviewers were hearing but this is going back. Voices sound like talking with their hands over their mouths. Bad bad bad.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Made good use of this sound bar so far. Anywhere from media items, Bluetooth to iPhone, iPad, and Amazon Echo. I even moved it to my garage to play sound for a haunted house.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: OMGi it is amazing! Can't get any better. One for us and one for son! Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Irish-lass

customer_reviews.title: 00 sound bar - I looked up ratings and were very good have it on now sounds great for what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought new tv for wall mount seller wanted me to buy $800.00 sound bar - I looked up ratings and were very good have it on now sounds great for what I need and budget! Would recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tamala

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality with my main TV in the living ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality with my main TV in the living room. Lack of display is not really an issue as once you have the settings to your liking after installing you probably won't need to change them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: wow...great sound ...good base.. really adds to movie watching. streams music thru bluetooth great too. super good deal for the sound you get at this price...got it on sale for $300 which was even sweeter.
customer_reviews.author: Jakedog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the great buys! The very best Sound bar and bass unit! I'm sold on Yamaha!
customer_reviews.author: JUAN-CARLOS

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my son. He was blown away. Loves it. It helped that he had told me that this was what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Marva Baez

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Love how it fits over the TV's base. My husband seems to like it; it was his Christmas gift from me. Perfect price range!
customer_reviews.author: Erica W.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Very solid sound bar. For the price I think the sound is very very good. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous sound, it came with a stencil to show where to drill holes for mounting. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: As good as bars twice the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, sounds as good as products twice the price. If you are looking for a sound bar follow CNET and take a hard look at this one. Only drawback is it does not work with RF remotes, only IR
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: I expected more.
customer_reviews.text: I expected a little more. The sound bar itself is nice and solid, looks goods and easy to hook up. Everything sounds good except voices are a little muffled when watching movies through the TV or blue ray player, even when I switch it to the clear voice. The voices are hard to hear because all the background music and noises in the movie drowns out the voices. I returned it and I'm now in search of one that I can hear the dialogue better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark St

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha YAS-203 soundbar
customer_reviews.text: works great, sounds great, bass is great. Yamaha YAS 203 is totally worth it.. excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: JR.

customer_reviews.title: Reviews were right!
customer_reviews.text: All the rave reviews I've read are correct! Quick, easy setup including programming it to learn my tv remote and activating the pass thru sensor so my tv remote signal can pass thru the soundbar. A HUGE improvement in sound of my new 65" Samsung! Good base thru the sub and music sounds great in stereo mode. It's a keeper for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Guarcello

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the performance and purchase. Good sound. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Krweiss

customer_reviews.title: Good. Just good.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Sounds good. Average good. Not amazingly good.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great!!! Good bass and clear voice highly recommended....
customer_reviews.author: Ian’s Repairs

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The subwoofer is not as powerful as my last system from Sony even at its highest setting but the sound is much better balanced and dialogue is better. I usually don't like too much bass but it's nice to hear/feel the action in certain movies. It is otherwise a great system for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tonye's Music

customer_reviews.title: Sublime
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely stunning addition to our big screen TV, it really produces a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: todd f. fisher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good, and has a remote with many useful features. Nothing comes close for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marv Moses

customer_reviews.title: Good for Flat Panel TV
customer_reviews.text: Good entry level system. Wireless subwoofer. Did find the higher pitched sounds do fuzz a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Di Pierro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great soundboar with some awesome bass. Yamaha you never have failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Inpressive sound quality, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive sound quality with my Panasonic Blu-Ray and new Roku TV 4K.
customer_reviews.author: NW Classic Rock Fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for me, improve the sound from all my devices.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Ilie

customer_reviews.title: A sound option for every occasion
customer_reviews.text: The sound profiles and other options make this sound bar a great product at a good price. The bass, particularly, is way more powerful than one would expect from such a unit.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: This product was so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This product was so easy to install. It took less than 30 minutes to unpack, read the instructions and power it up. So far (about a month) I've been very impressed with the sound quality, it's easy to control and the sub woofer has a real kick to it. Very satisfied to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair K Harper

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, sounds good, costs quite a bit. Bought it based on reviews. Didn't want to try and return a bunch of cheaper units.
customer_reviews.author: Scottir\e

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised at the sound quality for music ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the sound quality for music and especially for the extra clarity it added for voice on our TV.
customer_reviews.author: MrBill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my father. Still working great with no problems 6 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Joey D

customer_reviews.title: I found the sound very poor and less in fact that my LG 4k tv
customer_reviews.text: In contrast to many online articles about this sound bar, I found the sound very poor and less in fact that my LG 4k tv. Returned to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sound bar I've owned so far. Great bass and overall sound quality is very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R Carey

customer_reviews.title: A Worthy Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I had a YAS 101 before--reasonably good, but no subwoofer or bluetooth. The YAS 203 is a great upgrade. I didn't want to spend a lot of money and I wanted a simple setup. I read a CNET review and decided to to purchase this sound bar. For its price and features, it's absolutely excellent. Yamaha's repeater feature should be standard on every sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ron K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, works beautifully, sounds great and the price was not too high. I just wish that amazon's product description had mentioned that an optical cable is included so that I wouldn't have bothered to order a separate optical cable.
customer_reviews.author: amazon purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and volume for small to mid sized rooms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few weeks back. I was initially a little surprised at just how small the physical unit is. After unpacking the item, it was really easy to get setup, including getting my existing TV remote to adjust power (on/off) and adjust volume (up/down). The sound and volume on this product is really quite good for a small to medium sized room. I am really quite pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MLdef

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing and so clear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my new Samsung UN65KS8500 Curved TV. Took me 5 min to connect to the TV. Sound is amazing and so clear. I also have a JBL SB350 connected to my old TV Samsung 55" curved and comparing both Yamaha is much more clearer, louder and has heavy bass. The remote of Yamaha is also cool and easy to get any sound you prefer. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound quality but I don't get good surround simulation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this sound bar to go with a new TV, love the sound coming from it and how easily you can adjust things to your liking. Easy setup as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Garman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Clean, clear sound. Soundbar looks nice and sleek and sub woofer sits hidden behind couch. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sdoise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase. Sounds great, easy to set up, and bluetooth works great with my iphone
customer_reviews.author: Bernie C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The "surround sound" is not convincing though. Nice and clear with good bass.
customer_reviews.author: Diterex

product_meta.title: Yamaha YAS-203 Sound Bar with Bluetooth and Wireless Subwoofer
product_meta.description: Make all of your movies and TV shows come to life with clear, spacious sound. The piano-black finish of the sound bar looks great with your TV and the wireless subwoofer can be placed anywhere in the room to deliver rich, impactful bass. Bluetooth lets you wirelessly stream music from your iPhone, iPad and Android devices.
feature_bullets: Length & Power Output: 34.9-inch 200 W (7.1 channels) – ideal for 40-inch and larger TVs
Wall Mountable: Yes; Remote Included: Yes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars439 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
